Panic Button

Turns your mobile phone into a
secret alarm for when you're in trouble

More  
 

How Does Panic Button Work?

  • TAKE TIME to set-up Panic Button somewhere safe and quiet

  • Create a plan with your contacts so that they are PREPARED to ACT

  • CHECK you are ready and that your mobile phone has credit and battery

  • ACTIVATE Panic Button in an emergency by rapidly pressing the phone's power button

  • Your network will receive an SMS and regular updates of your location helping them to ACT FAST

More  
 

Is Panic Button
right for you?

Here are some simple questions to help you assess
if Panic Button is right for you
(your answers will not be recorded)

!

Using Panic Button to send an alert only improves your safety when your contacts can do something to help you. The disguise is only here to delay the discovery of the application for as long as possible to send your location updates. A competent adversary might be able to find out about your location, that you are alerting your contacts or the identity of your contacts.

Do you have an ANDROID phone?

Do you own and have independent access to your phone?

Yes
No
I do not know
back

Question 2 / 5

Only use Panic Button if you have independent access to your phone. This prevents false alarms and also misuse, such as partners or family members using the app to track you without your knowledge.

Continue
back

Recommendation 2 / 5

Only use Panic Button if you have independent access to your phone. This prevents false alarms and also misuse, such as partners or family members using the app to track you without your knowledge.

Continue Anyway
back

Recommendation 2 / 5

Independent access means that only you own and access your phone - if you share your phone with a partner or family members it may not be a good idea to use Panic Button. This is to prevent false alarms and also misuse, such as partners or family members using the app to track you without your knowledge.

Continue Anyway
back

Recommendation 2 / 5

Do you have three trusted contacts in your network who can respond fast in an emergency?

Yes
No
I do not know
back

Question 3 / 5

Panic Button aims to send your emergency message/s to your trusted contacts when you need help. However, the app is not able to guarantee a response. Think carefully when choosing your trusted contacts and always talk to them first to ensure you have a response plan in place."

Continue
back

Recommendation 3 / 5

Panic Button aims to send your emergency message/s to your trusted contacts when you need help. However, the app is not able to guarantee a response. Think carefully when choosing your trusted contacts and always talk to them first to ensure you have a response plan in place.

Continue Anyway
back

Recommendation 3 / 5

Panic Button aims to send your emergency message/s to your trusted contacts when you need help. However, the app is not able to guarantee a response. Think carefully when choosing your trusted contacts and always talk to them first to ensure you have a response plan in place.

Continue

Question 4 / 5

Your country might be known to practise mass telecommunications monitoring and interception. If your profession makes you a target of this, then you should think seriously about whether using Panic Button will reveal information about your location and trusted contacts that could put you or them at increased risk.

Continue
back

If your profession makes you a target of this, then you should think seriously about whether using Panic Button will reveal information about your location and trusted contacts that could put you or them at increased risk.

Continue Anyway

Recommendation 4 / 5

Your country might be known to practise mass telecommunications monitoring and interception. If your profession makes you a target of this, then you should think seriously about whether using Panic Button will reveal information about your location and trusted contacts that could put you or them at increased risk.

Continue
back

Recommendation 4 / 5

Panic Button is a useful tool to alert your network quickly and discretely in an emergency. It is not a fail-safe security tool!

Recommendation 5 / 5

 
More  
 

Panic Button Features

   
  1. EMERGENCY SMS

    Sends emergency SMS to your three trusted contacts in an emergency

  2. LOCATION MAP

    Attaches map link with location coordinates when GPS is enabled

  3. RAPID & DISCRETE

    Alerts discretely and rapidly from phone's power button

  4. DATA PROTECTED

    Protects app data with disguise screen and pin number

  5. SECURITY TIPS

    Provides tips on security for safer use

  6.  
 
More
